1485250.name: Frame of Mind
1485250.description:
In Frame of Mind, you are placed in a world where logic is escaping you. Each area of the game defies reason, requiring you to think outside the box in order to solve the illogical and escape madness.

15+ reality-defying puzzles

A world that conforms to your observation

30+ minutes of mind-bending gameplay

Speedrun Mode (Unlock upon completing the Game)

This game was made by [Sample Text] Studios, a group of 6 in their 2nd year of studying at Media Design School, New Zealand.

Need help on a puzzle? Want to talk to the devs? Join our [Sample Text] community discord server!

CONTROLS

⯈ Mouse To Look

⯈ 'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' To Move

⯈ Space To Jump

⯈ 'ESC' To Pause
1485250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
